attributes.action: Force Lancashire Chemical Works to get rid of the smell covering Glossop, Derbyshire
attributes.additional_details:
We want the Government to force Lancashire Chemical Works in Glossop to stop polluting our air with the awful smell that has been covering Glossop for the past year. Local children are unable to play outside as the smell makes them feel sick, and people have reported not being able to use their gardens due to the smell.

Anyone looking to sell their house is going to have problems as no one viewing a house in an area that smells like this is going to want to buy in Glossop, and tourism and the High Street shops will suffer because of it too.
